entries.title: Monetary Policy - BCRP
entries.text: The BCRP follows a policy of Explicit Inflation Targets. The inflation target (a range between 1 and 3 percent) seeks to anchor inflation expectations.

entries.title: Informative notes on the Monetary Program - BCRP
entries.text: It contains a description of the decision on the reference interest rate, the basis for such decision, the explanation of the evolution of inflation.
